New Records: Francisco Lindor's grand slam was the first lead-flipping postseason slam in Mets history
Key Match Events: Lindor's sixth-inning grand slam clinched the series for the Mets
Post-Match Reflections: Ryne Stanek and Pete Alonso expressed their joy at Lindor's historic home run
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the second late-inning grand slam in Mets history
